Highlights.name: Focus on Problem-solving:
Highlights.description: pxdlabs emphasizes their ability to tackle complex problems through "facilitated experiences and conversation." This suggests a collaborative approach that uses design thinking to identify and solve client challenges.

Highlights.name: Innovative Solutions:
Highlights.description: Their services go beyond traditional design by incorporating "serious play" and "innovation design" techniques. This indicates a focus on creative and out-of-the-box solutions.

Highlights.name: Collaborative Approach
Highlights.description: pxdlabs highlights their co-creative strategic design approach. This means they work closely with clients throughout the design process to ensure solutions align with their needs.

enhanced_description: pxd labs is a strategic partner specializing in business strategy and service innovation design. They employ a co-creative approach, leveraging methodologies such as corporate foresight, serious play facilitation, and design thinking to help organizations tackle complex problems. Their core objective is to create innovative and out-of-the-box solutions that align with client needs, particularly focusing on improving employee happiness and engagement within HR and total rewards contexts.
